flawed_nl_solution:
Lucca has 100 basketballs x (10 / 100) = <<100*10/100=10>>10 basketballs.
Lucien has 200 basketballs x (20 / 100) = <<200*(20/100)=40>>40 basketballs
Together they have 10 basketballs + 40 basketballs = <<10+40=47>>47 basketballs.
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 47. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
